meanings: (선대의 인류가 남긴 물건) relic, antiquity, artifact

vlive.korean: 야 고대유물이라니 어떻게 싸이를 안 하냐? No way. How do you not have Cyworld? 듣기 View video 스튜디오 픽또 / PICK DDO : 인싸가 된 아싸짱 ep.2
vlive.english: No way. How do you not have Cyworld?

vlive.korean: [과거 은하가 한복 입고 판핍 추던 유물 영상을 발굴] 가운데로! 가운데로! [We found the old video of Eunha dancing poppin in hanbok] To the center! 듣기 View video 아이돌룸(IDOL ROOM) : 아이돌룸(IDOL ROOM) 35회 - 영원히 고통받는 섹시 팝핀 은하 (※이불킥주의)
vlive.english: [We found the old video of Eunha dancing poppin in hanbok] To the center!

vlive.korean: 지금 유물 된 거예요? Is this a relic? 듣기 View video SECHSKIES : [REPLAY] 젝키의 Re모콘 (SECHSKIES's Remote Control)
왜? -유물. 이런 걸 유물이라고 하는 거죠. Why? - Relic. This is called a relic. 듣기 View video SECHSKIES : [REPLAY] 젝키의 Re모콘 (SECHSKIES's Remote Control)
vlive.english: Why? - Relic. This is called a relic.

vlive.korean: 세 가지 유물이 모이면... If we have three things... 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [FULL] 2018 GLOBAL VLIVE TOP 10 - JBJ

examples.korean: The area is a treasure house of archaeological relics. 발음듣기 그 지역은 고고학적 유물의 보고이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The area is a treasure house of archaeological relics. 발음

examples.korean: A number of the monuments are of considerable antiquity. 발음듣기 많은 유물들이 상당히 오래된 것들이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: A number of the monuments are of considerable antiquity. 발음

examples.korean: The relics were objects of veneration. 발음듣기 그 유물들은 숭배를 표하는 물건들이었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The relics were objects of veneration. 발음

examples.korean: hangover laws from the previous administration 발음듣기 이전 행정부의 유물인 법률들 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: hangover laws from the previous administration 발음

examples.korean: He’s a leftover from the hippies in the 1960s. 발음듣기 그는 1960년대 히피의 유물이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He’s a leftover from the hippies in the 1960s. 발음
